Title: DotNetNuke agPageAdmin
Description: The agPageAdmin module is a Silverlight based replacement for the core DotNetNuke Pages module which is located on the Admin menu.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The agPageAdmin module is a Silverlight based replacement for the core DotNetNuke Pages module which is located on the Admin menu.

This project is being created in conjunction with the DotNetNuke Hackathon - "Visual DotNetNuke" that was hosted at the Capital DotNetNuke User Group on June 17th, 2010.
